00047 
00048 void
00049 Server::addServiceId(int32_t serviceId)
00050 {
00051     bool add_id = true;
00052     // Iterate over the vector so we don't end up with duplicates
00053     for (int i = 0; i < _serviceIds.size(); i++) {
00054         if (_serviceIds[i] == serviceId) {
00055             add_id = false;
00056             break;
00057         }
00058     }
00059 
00060     if (add_id) {
00061         _serviceIds.push_back(serviceId);
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void
00066 Server::removeServiceId(int32_t serviceId)
00067 {
00068     for (int i = 0; i < _serviceIds.size(); i++) {
00069         if (_serviceIds[i] == serviceId) {
00070             _serviceIds.erase(_serviceIds.begin() + i);
00071             break;
00072         }
00073     }
00074 }

00080 }

00086 
00087     _serverId = serverId;
00088 
00089     return old_id;
00090 }
